alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 5:26PM CDT until April 20 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Gillespie County in south central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Fredericksburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
